body: 那个预训练模型需要下载后修改config.py里的路径

I have edited 'config.py' and let `caffe_pretrain = False`
But when I run demo, I found that the output images doesn't have bounding boxes.
Here is some code in my 'config.py'.
```
    caffe_pretrain = False
    caffe_pretrain_path = '/home/kxy/FCHD-Fully-Convolutional-Head-Detector/checkpoints/head_detector_final'
    test_output_path = '/home/kxy/'
```
And also, in order to see the images(I am running code on remote server), I force to output the image like this in 'head_detection_demo.py'
```
    for i in range(pred_bboxes_.shape[0]):
        ymin, xmin, ymax, xmax = pred_bboxes_[i,:]
        utils.draw_bounding_box_on_image_array(img_raw,ymin, xmin, ymax, xmax) 

    plt.switch_backend('agg') # added by me
    plt.axis('off')
    plt.imshow(img_raw)
    SAVE_FLAG = 1; # added by me
    if SAVE_FLAG == 1:
        plt.savefig(os.path.join(opt.test_output_path, file_id+'.png'), bbox_inches='tight', pad_inches=0)
    else:
        plt.show()    
```
Is there any wrong in both of these?

你好，你的问题解决了吗？
我同样也是在远程服务器运行我的代码。我修改【config.py】其中的代码
`caffe_pretrain = True`
` caffe_pretrain_path = '下载的预训练模型【vgg16_caffe.pth】`
` model_save_path = '下载的预训练模型路径【head_detector_final】`
  `test_output_path='输出结果存储在本地的路径'`
修改这一行代码在【head_detection_demo.py】
`SAVE_FLAG = 1`
最后，根据Issue#15修改两行代码[link](https://github.com/aditya-vora/FCHD-Fully-Convolutional-Head-Detector/issues/15)，这样子就能准确运行了

@zrl4836 我已经成功运行了demo（修改了参数，也看到你说的那个Issue并按照里面的方法修改了代码），但同样也谢谢你的帮助！:)
另外提一下，为什么不加代码会有Bounding Box移位的问题呢，不太理解。。

这个我还没去认真理解代码。
其实这两行代码上下对换就可以了，作者应该是想获取转置之后的长宽比进行预测
`_, H, W = img.shape`
`img = img.transpose((2,0,1))`
另外我发现最后的输出结果的图片尺寸变了，
如果在原来的640*480图片绘画框就应该不会移位。
我还没进行测试，这只是我的猜测。 @Piddnad
@zrl4836 Get，我再好好理解一下代码。谢谢分享。

Hi zrl4836 and Piddnad, 
Thanks for sharing, your discussions help me a lot.
good luck.

Hi, 
Is it possible to provide the solution above in english?
Cheers!

1. Edit 'config.py':
`caffe_pretrain = True`
` caffe_pretrain_path = 'path of [vgg16_caffe.pth]'`
` model_save_path = 'path of [head_detector_final]'`
`test_output_path='the path you want your model to save to'`
2. Edit 'head_detection_demo.py':
`SAVE_FLAG = 1`
3. Finally，refer to Issue#15 and edit those two line[link](https://github.com/aditya-vora/FCHD-Fully-Convolutional-Head-Detector/issues/15),and in the way you will run demo successfully! @ @MuadDev

issue.title: Fixes all the issues currently affecting the head detection demo

repository.name: FCHD-Fully-Convolutional-Head-Detector
repository.description: Code for FCHD - A fast and accurate head detector

issue.body:
Specifically.
- Fixed #22 , also added instructions in the README.
- Fixed #15 , Applied the necessary changes directly in the code.
- Added instructions in the README to prevent #27 (`ConnectionRefusedError`)

Tested the code to work correctly on Ubuntu 18.04

issue.title: Fixed issues with building NMS and running demo

repository.name: FCHD-Fully-Convolutional-Head-Detector
repository.description: Code for FCHD - A fast and accurate head detector

issue.body:
**Fixes provide by pull request #38** of @IAmSuyogJadhav :

- Fixes #22, also added instructions in the README.
- Fixed #15, Applied the necessary changes directly in the code.
Added instructions in the README to prevent #27 (ConnectionRefusedError)

**Also** his pull request Fixes #39.

**New fixes** provided by @romamartyanov:

- Fixes #53 by changing [_nms_gpu_post.c](https://github.com/aditya-vora/FCHD-Fully-Convolutional-Head-Detector/blob/master/src/nms/_nms_gpu_post.c) file with the help of [this reply](https://github.com/aditya-vora/FCHD-Fully-Convolutional-Head-Detector/issues/53#issuecomment-575148219)
- Fixes issue related to the call of decorator from the new version of Cython in file [non_maximum_suppression.py](https://github.com/aditya-vora/FCHD-Fully-Convolutional-Head-Detector/blob/master/src/nms/non_maximum_suppression.py)
